subs.text: @paulcomp @Adlemig @Tupp_Ed A recent survey found that a significant fraction of younger Americans thought that using a standard aerial antenna to watch live TV broadcasts was a form of #piracy.

subs.text: @DerekL1963 @Casillic It could be manually cleaned (with the cleaning materials placed into the outgoing container) as necessary, and then scanned for surface contamination while still within the glovebox.
